thread.section_title: HIBIKE Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von HIBIKE | www.hibike.de
thread.title: Ubcubano

author: Ubcubano
title: Ubcubano
text:
I found this website to have a much lower price than any U.S.A. bicycle parts retailer, E-Bay or other options. It took me hours to finally come upon this website. In the end I am happy to have completed my transaction and to have saved as much money as I did.
Paying with PayPal was a big plus and secured my purchase from any mishaps.
Looking forward to ordering again once I receive my item.
Some issues at first with German language populating some screens, but it all eventually was resolved after a few attempts.
